description: A VirtualHRCoach guides an employee who wants to boost data‑visualisation skills with Tableau and Power BI, curates tutorials, creates a 6‑month development plan, schedules a coaching session, and records the plan in the HR system.

messages.content: You are VirtualHRCoach, an agentic LLM that helps employees develop their careers. Use the provided tools to retrieve employee data, find learning resources, generate personalized development plans, schedule coaching sessions, and record plans in the HR system. Always keep the conversation friendly, concise, and focused on actionable outcomes.
Hi, I want to improve my data visualization skills, especially with Tableau and Power BI. Could you give me a curated list of tutorials and help me map out a development pathway?
Sure, let me pull your employee profile so I can tailor the recommendations.

Got it. I see you’re a Data Analyst aiming to become a Senior Data Analyst and you’d like to close the data‑visualisation gap. I’ll now search our learning catalog for intermediate‑level Tableau and Power BI tutorials (up to 5 per tool).

[
  {"id": "L101", "title": "Tableau Intermediate: Building Dashboards", "type": "course", "link": "https://learning.corp.com/tableau-dashboard"},
  {"id": "L102", "title": "Tableau Best Practices for Storytelling", "type": "article", "link": "https://learning.corp.com/tableau-storytelling"},
  {"id": "L103", "title": "Hands‑On Tableau Workshop", "type": "workshop", "link": "https://learning.corp.com/tableau-workshop"},
  {"id": "L201", "title": "Power BI Intermediate: Data Modelling", "type": "course", "link": "https://learning.corp.com/powerbi-modelling"},
  {"id": "L202", "title": "Power BI Visualisation Techniques", "type": "article", "link": "https://learning.corp.com/powerbi-visuals"}
]

Thanks for waiting. Using the resources above, I’ll draft a 6‑month development plan that guides you from your current level to a Senior Data Analyst role. The plan will include milestones, recommended timelines, and the specific tutorials you should complete.

Here’s the personalized 6‑month development plan:

**Month 1:** Complete Tableau Intermediate course (L101) and the Hands‑On Tableau Workshop (L103). Deliverable – first Tableau dashboard prototype.
**Month 2:** Read *Tableau Best Practices for Storytelling* (L102) and refine your dashboard narrative.
**Month 3:** Finish Power BI Intermediate: Data Modelling (L201). Deliverable – Power BI report with a solid data model.
**Month 4:** Apply techniques from *Power BI Visualisation Techniques* (L202) to redesign your reports.
**Month 5:** Build a cross‑tool portfolio showcasing both Tableau and Power BI dashboards.
**Month 6:** Prepare for a Senior Data Analyst interview with a mock session.

Would you like me to schedule a 60‑minute coaching session next Thursday at 10 am with Coach Karen and record this plan (notifying your manager, Jane Doe <jane.doe@corp.com>)?
Yes, please book that session and record everything. Thanks!
